ProductStore.authDeclinedMessage: There has been a problem with your method of payment. Please try a different method or call customer service.
ProductStore.authFraudMessage: Your order has been rejected and your account has been disabled due to fraud.
ProductStore.authErrorMessage: Problem connecting to payment processor; we will continue to retry and notify you by email.

ElectronicText.textData:
Profile
English:Rydges Tapae Chiang Mai Hotel is the newest addition to the skyline of this ancient and beautiful city, Chiang Mai, the Rose of Thailands' beautiful North. It's is very conveniently located at one of Chiang Mai’s most famous entrance gates into the city, Tahpae Gate, and is only 10 minutes away from the airport...

Facilities
Rydges Chiang Mai offers the most modern rooms in Chiang Mai with the best facilities for all guests, whether business or leisure travellers.Rydges Chiang Mai IT staff can assist you to set your computer up to access your e-mail or your home office, and we can also provide high end computer support if you experience problems...

Conferences
As the newest Hotel on the Map of Chiang Mai, Rydges Tapae Chiang Mai Hotel has the staff capacity to not only host your conference but to provide a total support package, from managing the meeting rooms, decorations, supporting staff etc., right up to and including rooms management for those attending your conference...

Business Center
Located on Level 2, in front of the Elevators, Rydges Tapae Chiang Mai has the most modern Business Centre of any Hotel in Chiang Mai, and one of the best equippped and supported in Asia. High Speed(256/128 KBps) Internet Access from 7.30 AM to 10.00 PM daily is available on our own machines, with minimum time-on-line tickets...

Wireless Internet Access
High Speed (256/128 KBps) Internet Access from 7.30 AM to 10.00 PM daily is available on our own machines, with minimum time-on-line tickets, which can be used during your entire stay. In-house IT support staff can also assist you to set up your own computer on our 802.11 Wireless Access System...

Profile
Dutch: Rydges Tapae Chiang Mai Hotel is een van de nieuwste Hotels van dit oude en mooie stadje, Chiang Mai, the Rose of Thailands' beautiful North. It's is very conveniently located at one of Chiang Mai’s most famous entrance gates into the city, Tahpae Gate, and is only 10 minutes away from the airport...
